// Package: wininst
//
// Used for Windows-specific installation
//
/
// This file was automatically generated during installation.
// It wraps a standard header file that did not exist for this compiler
// and adds its symbols to namespace std.
// The existence of this file indicates that your compiler does not
// conform to the ISO/IEC standard 14882 for C++.
#if ( __BORLANDC__ == 0x540 ) 
#include <ctype.h>

#ifdef CGAL_CFG_CCTYPE_MACRO_BUG
#ifdef isalnum
#undef isalnum
#endif // isalnum
#ifdef isalpha
#undef isalpha
#endif // isalpha
#ifdef iscntrl
#undef iscntrl
#endif // iscntrl
#ifdef isdigit
#undef isdigit
#endif // isdigit
#ifdef isgraph
#undef isgraph
#endif // isgraph
#ifdef islower
#undef islower
#endif // islower
#ifdef isprint
#undef isprint
#endif // isprint
#ifdef ispunct
#undef ispunct
#endif // ispunct
#ifdef isspace
#undef isspace
#endif // isspace
#ifdef isupper
#undef isupper
#endif // isupper
#ifdef isxdigit
#undef isxdigit
#endif // isxdigit

#endif // CGAL_CFG_CCTYPE_MACRO_BUG

#if defined(CGAL_CFG_NO_STDC_NAMESPACE) && !defined(CGAL_NO_STDC_NAMESPACE)

namespace std {
	using ::isalnum;
	using ::isalpha;
	using ::iscntrl;
	using ::isdigit;
	using ::isgraph;
	using ::islower;
	using ::isprint;
	using ::ispunct;
	using ::isspace;
	using ::isupper;
	using ::isxdigit;
}

#endif // CGAL_CFG_NO_STDC_NAMESPACE && !CGAL_NO_STDC_NAMESPACE
#endif
// EOF //
